title: Can these senators save NEPA? – This Week in Cleantech
description: On this episode of the This Week in Cleantech podcast, Jael Holzman from Heatmap News discusses how several senators  came out against the SPEED Act, a bill that would change the National Environmental Policy Act, or NEPA.
content: On this episode of the This Week in Cleantech podcast, Jael Holzman from Heatmap News discusses how several senators  came out against the SPEED Act, a bill that would change the National Environmental Policy Act, or NEPA.
